org.apache.hadoop.hive.shims

Interface HadoopShims

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Hadoop23Shims, HadoopShimsSecure

    public interface HadoopShims
    In order to be compatible with multiple versions of Hadoop, all parts of the Hadoop interface that are not cross-version compatible are encapsulated in an implementation of this class. Users should use the ShimLoader class as a factory to obtain an implementation of HadoopShims corresponding to the version of Hadoop currently on the classpath.

      • getLocations

        org.apache.hadoop.fs.BlockLocation[] getLocations(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem fs,
                                                  org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileStatus status)
                                           throws IOException
        For file status returned by listLocatedStatus, convert them into a list of block locations.

        the block locations of the file
        Throws:

      • getLocationsWithOffset

        TreeMap<Long,org.apache.hadoop.fs.BlockLocation> getLocationsWithOffset(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem fs,
                                                                        org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileStatus status)
                                                                 throws IOException
        For the block locations returned by getLocations() convert them into a Treemap <Offset,blockLocation> by iterating over the list of blockLocation. Using TreeMap from offset to blockLocation, makes it O(logn) to get a particular block based upon offset.
        Parameters:
        fs - the file system
        status - the file information
        Returns:
        TreeMap<Long, BlockLocation>
        Throws:
        IOException

      • checkFileAccess

        void checkFileAccess(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem fs,
                     org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileStatus status,
                     org.apache.hadoop.fs.permission.FsAction action)
              throws IOException,
                     AccessControlException,
                     Exception
        Check if the configured UGI has access to the path for the given file system action. Method will return successfully if action is permitted. AccessControlExceptoin will be thrown if user does not have access to perform the action. Other exceptions may be thrown for non-access related errors.
        Parameters:
        fs -
        status -
        action -
        Throws:
        IOException
        AccessControlException
        Exception

      • runDistCpAs

        boolean runDistCpAs(List<org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path> srcPaths,
                    org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path dst,
                    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                    String doAsUser)
             throws IOException
        Copies a source dir/file to a destination by orchestrating the copy between hdfs nodes. This distributed process is meant to copy huge files that could take some time if a single copy is done. This is a variation which allows proxying as a different user to perform the distcp, and requires that the caller have requisite proxy user privileges.
        Parameters:
        srcPaths - List of Path to the source files or directories to copy
        dst - Path to the destination file or directory
        conf - The hadoop configuration object
        doAsUser - The user to perform the distcp as
        Returns:
        True if it is successfull; False otherwise.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • runDistCp

        boolean runDistCp(List<org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path> srcPaths,
                  org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path dst,
                  org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
           throws IOException
        Copies a source dir/file to a destination by orchestrating the copy between hdfs nodes. This distributed process is meant to copy huge files that could take some time if a single copy is done.
        Parameters:
        srcPaths - List of Path to the source files or directories to copy
        dst - Path to the destination file or directory
        conf - The hadoop configuration object
        Returns:
        True if it is successfull; False otherwise.
        Throws:
        IOException

                                                 throws IOException

        Returns:
        A new instance of the HdfsEncryption shim.
        Throws:

      • readByteBuffer

        int readByteBuffer(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FSDataInputStream file,
                   ByteBuffer dest)
            throws IOException
        Reads data into ByteBuffer.
        Parameters:
        file - File.
        dest - Buffer.
        Returns:
        Number of bytes read, just like file.read. If any bytes were read, dest position will be set to old position + number of bytes read.
        Throws:
        IOException

        Throws:
